response: hi there! how can i help you today?
im doing great, thank you for asking! how are you?
im an ai chatbot. you can call me assistant!
i can answer questions, have conversations, and help with various tasks.
why dont scientists trust atoms? because they make up everything!
i dont have access to weather data, but i hope its nice where you are!
of course! what do you need help with?
youre very welcome! im glad i could help.
goodbye! it was nice chatting with you. have a great day!
ai stands for artificial intelligence. its technology that enables machines to simulate human intelligence.
